description: Establishes comprehensive requirements for indoor agriculture operations including controlled environment agriculture (CEA), facility management, environmental controls, pest management, sanitation, operational practices, water systems, growing media, harvest procedures, and worker welfare. Aligned with official PrimusGFS v4.0 Checklist Module 3 (Sections 3.01-3.14).
scope: All aspects of indoor agriculture operations including growing facilities, environmental controls, production processes, and harvest activities within controlled environment settings

sections.title: Title & Document Control
sections.contentGuidance: Document identification (number, title, version, dates), approval signatures, distribution list

sections.title: Purpose / Objective
sections.contentGuidance: Why this document exists, what it achieves for indoor agriculture operations, business and compliance drivers

sections.title: Scope
sections.contentGuidance: What indoor agriculture operations/areas covered, facility boundaries, who is responsible, any exclusions or limitations

sections.title: Definitions & Abbreviations
sections.contentGuidance: Minimum 5-8 relevant technical terms, acronyms (CEA, IPM, HVAC), or facility-specific terminology

sections.title: Roles & Responsibilities
sections.contentGuidance: Specific positions with clearly defined duties for indoor agriculture operations, authority levels, and accountability

sections.title: Prerequisites & Reference Documents
sections.contentGuidance: Related SOPs, standards (Primus GFS, GFSI), regulatory requirements, industry best practices for indoor agriculture

sections.title: Hazard / Risk Analysis
sections.contentGuidance: Indoor agriculture-specific hazards (environmental controls, contamination risks, facility-specific hazards), risk assessment, control measures

sections.title: Procedures
sections.contentGuidance: Detailed step-by-step procedures for indoor agriculture operations (minimum 8-12 steps), specific actions, frequencies, methods

sections.title: Monitoring Plan
sections.contentGuidance: What to monitor in indoor agriculture (environmental controls, sanitation, pest activity), how often, who is responsible, what records to keep, acceptance criteria

sections.title: Verification & Validation Activities
sections.contentGuidance: How to verify procedures are followed in indoor operations, validation that procedures are effective, audit/review frequency

sections.title: Corrective & Preventive Action (CAPA) Protocol
sections.contentGuidance: Triggers for CAPA in indoor agriculture, investigation steps, containment, root cause analysis, corrective actions, preventive measures, verification

sections.title: Traceability & Recall Elements
sections.contentGuidance: Growing area identification, batch traceability, raw material traceability, record linkages

sections.title: Record Retention & Document Control
sections.contentGuidance: What records are generated, retention periods, storage location, access control

sections.title: Compliance Crosswalk
sections.contentGuidance: Table mapping Primus Code | Requirement | Document Section | Evidence

sections.title: Revision History & Approval Signatures
sections.contentGuidance: Revision table (version, date, description) and signature lines (Prepared By, Reviewed By, Approved By)
